entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
